overview: Period costuming and a magnificent French estate highlight the splendour of Philip's Lovers. Young Prince Philip has lots of horny aristocratic friends. They come to visit and enjoy the hospitality that only the big-dicked Prince and his equally horny servants can provide. All eleven cast members are hung like the proverbial horses they ride on! One hot sex scene blends into another as these eleven studs suck and rim and lick and screw all over the estate. Everyone is hard all the time and their slik garments are rarely being worn!
title: Junge Prinzen: Philip's Lovers
